an8.23:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava alaviyam viharati aggalave cetiye.
an8.23:1.3: “sattahi, bhikkhave, acchariyehi abbhutehi dhammehi samannagatam hatthakam alavakam dharetha.
an8.23:1.12: imehi kho, bhikkhave, sattahi acchariyehi abbhutehi dhammehi samannagatam hatthakam alavakam dharetha”ti.
an8.23:1.14: Idam vatvana sugato utthayasana viharam pavisi.
an8.23:2.1: Atha kho annataro bhikkhu pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya yena hatthakassa alavakassa nivesanam tenupasankami; upasankamitva pannatte asane nisidi.
an8.23:2.2: Atha kho hatthako alavako yena so bhikkhu tenupasankami; upasankamitva tam bhikkhum abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinnam kho hatthakam alavakam so bhikkhu etadavoca:
an8.23:3.1: “Sattahi kho tvam, avuso, acchariyehi abbhutehi dhammehi samannagato bhagavata byakato.
an8.23:3.10: Imehi kho tvam, avuso, sattahi acchariyehi abbhutehi dhammehi samannagato bhagavata byakato”ti.
an8.23:3.11: “Kaccittha, bhante, na koci gihi ahosi odatavasano”ti?
an8.23:3.12: “Na hettha, avuso, koci gihi ahosi odatavasano”ti.
an8.23:3.13: “Sadhu, bhante, yadettha na koci gihi ahosi odatavasano”ti.
an8.23:4.1: Atha kho so bhikkhu hatthakassa alavakassa nivesane pindapatam gahetva utthayasana pakkami.
an8.23:4.2: Atha kho so bhikkhu pacchabhattam pindapatapatikkanto yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavoca:
an8.23:5.1: “Idhaham, bhante, pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya yena hatthakassa alavakassa nivesanam tenupasankamim; upasankamitva pannatte asane nisidim.
an8.23:5.2: Atha kho, bhante, hatthako alavako yenaham tenupasankami; upasankamitva mam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi.
an8.23:5.3: Ekamantam nisinnam kho aham, bhante, hatthakam alavakam etadavacam:
an8.23:5.4: ‘sattahi kho tvam, avuso, acchariyehi abbhutehi dhammehi samannagato bhagavata byakato.
an8.23:5.13: Imehi kho tvam, avuso, sattahi acchariyehi abbhutehi dhammehi samannagato bhagavata byakato’ti.
an8.23:6.1: Evam vutte, bhante, hatthako mam etadavoca:
an8.23:6.2: ‘kaccittha, bhante, na koci gihi ahosi odatavasano’ti?
an8.23:6.3: ‘Na hettha, avuso, koci gihi ahosi odatavasano’ti.
an8.23:6.4: ‘Sadhu, bhante, yadettha na koci gihi ahosi odatavasano’”ti.
an8.23:7.3: Santeyeva attani kusaladhamme na icchati parehi nayamane.
an8.23:7.4: Tena hi tvam, bhikkhu, iminapi atthamena acchariyena abbhutena dhammena samannagatam hatthakam alavakam dharehi, yadidam appicchataya”ti.
